title: Quick Clinical Data Access with Minimal Distractions
task: Accesses clinical health data of Olivia through ALFRED
summary: As a busy medical staff member, I want to access Olivia’s clinical health data quickly during my shifts without any non-critical or game-related notifications, so I can focus on efficient patient care without distractions.
cluster:
Quick Clinical Data Access with Minimal Distractions: Functional User Story  
Cluster: Manual Navigation Without Voice Guidance

title: Suppress Non-Critical Alerts During Shifts
task: Avoids non-critical alerts and game-related notifications during shifts
summary: As a registered nurse working busy urban shifts, I want ALFRED to block all non-critical and game-related notifications during my official work hours so I can focus fully on patient care without distractions.

title: Respect Privacy and Offline Contact Preferences
task: Respects Olivias preference for offline contact and privacy
summary: As a medical staff member, I want ALFRED to block all non-critical notifications and video check-ins during my shifts so I can focus fully on clinical care without distractions.

title: Suppress Non-Critical Alerts During Shifts
task: Balances clinical duties with patience toward users resistance
summary: As a medical staff member, I want ALFRED to block all non-critical notifications during my work shifts so I can focus on patient care without distractions, but allow critical alerts through.

title: Respect Olivia’s refusal of video check-ins
task: Finds Olivias refusal of video check-ins challenging
summary: As a medical staff member, I want to avoid video check-ins during care visits to maintain professional boundaries and minimize distractions, respecting patients' comfort and my focus on clinical tasks.

title: Strict Clinical Monitoring Without Distractions
task: Uses ALFRED strictly for professional healthcare monitoring
summary: As a medical staff member, I want ALFRED to show me only critical clinical data and silence all non-essential notifications during my work hours to maintain focus and efficiency in patient care.
cluster: Strict Control Over Health Data Sharing

title: Block Non-Critical Alerts During Work
task: Sets ALFRED to block all non-critical notifications during work hours
summary: As a medical staff member, I want ALFRED to block all non-critical notifications during my work hours so I can focus solely on urgent patient care without distractions.

title: Urgent Alert Filtering during Work Hours
task: Monitors Olivias vital data focusing only on urgent alerts
summary: As a busy medical staff member, I want ALFRED to block all non-critical notifications only during my official work hours so I can focus solely on urgent patient alerts without distractions.

title: Quick Access to Critical Health Data
task: Accesses validated health trends quickly without distraction
summary: As a registered nurse working busy urban shifts, I want to quickly access validated patient health trends without non-critical notifications so I can focus solely on urgent care without distractions.
cluster:
Quick Access to Critical Health Data
Strict Control of Health Data Sharing

title: Restrict Non-Clinical Features Outside Work Hours
task: Avoids interacting with non-clinical ALFRED features outside official hours
summary: As a medical staff member, I want ALFRED to block all non-clinical features and notifications outside my official work hours to prevent distractions and maintain focus on patient care during work shifts.

title: Streamlined Clinical Sensor Alerts
task: Demands a streamlined, clinical interface for receiving sensor alerts
summary: As a medical staff member, I want ALFRED to block all non-critical sensor notifications during my work hours so I can avoid distractions and focus exclusively on urgent patient health alerts.

title: Urgent Health Data Access Without Delays
task: Expresses frustration when privacy settings delay access to important health data
summary: As a busy medical staff member, I want to access critical patient health data immediately during my shifts with privacy safeguards so I can provide timely and effective care.

title: Filter Non-Critical Alerts During Work
task: Relies on ALFRED to prevent missed emergencies through tailored alert filtering
summary: As a registered nurse working in busy urban hospitals, I want ALFRED to block all non-critical notifications only during my shifts so I can concentrate fully on urgent patient care without distractions.

title: Disable Interactive Tutorials to Avoid Distractions
task: Disables interactive tutorials in the app to avoid distractions
summary: As a medical staff user, I want to disable all interactive tutorials in the app during my clinical shifts to maintain focus and avoid interruptions in my fast-paced work environment.

title: Manual Navigation Without Voice Guidance
task: Navigates the healthcare app manually without relying on voice guidance
summary: As a medical staff member, I want to navigate the healthcare app manually without voice guidance to avoid interruptions and maintain clinical focus during my busy shifts.

title: Seamless API Access to Patient Vitals
task: Relies on secure API integration to pull patient vitals into hospital systems
summary: As a busy urban nurse, I want to access validated patient vitals through a secure API quickly and without non-critical interruptions during clinical care to maintain focus.

title: Minimal Distraction Clinical Data Access
task: Expresses skepticism about adopting new digital tools in clinical workflow
summary: As a medical staff member, I want to block all non-critical notifications and disable interactive tutorials during official work hours so I can focus on efficiently accessing validated patient data without distractions, while still receiving urgent alerts.

title: Access Only Validated Patient Data
task: Trusts the data validation mechanisms to ensure accuracy
summary: As a registered nurse, I want to quickly access only validated patient data during my busy shifts so I can make reliable clinical decisions without distractions or doubts about data accuracy.
cluster: Strict Control Over Health Data Sharing

title: Manage App Notifications to Minimize Distractions
task: Manages app settings to reduce cognitive load during work hours
summary: As a medical staff member, I want to block all non-critical notifications and disable interactive tutorials during work hours to avoid distractions and maintain clinical focus while providing efficient patient care.

title: Minimal Interaction Without Explanations
task: Prefers minimal and efficient system interactions without friendly explanations
summary: As a registered nurse with limited time and high workload, I want to interact with ALFRED using only essential commands and skip all non-critical explanations and tutorials to quickly access clinical data without distractions.

title: Disable Emotional Engagement Features
task: Rejects features encouraging emotional engagement
summary: As a medical staff user, I want to disable all emotional engagement features like games and social suggestions during my official work shifts to stay focused solely on clinical tasks without distractions.
